EmailTemplate.subject: Start Your Cloud-Native Journey with Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in Pivotal!
We are passionate about partnering with customers to overcome challenges associated with lengthy enterprise IT cycles. With a proven portfolio <[[https://pivotal.io/products?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-gartner-cat-cloud-sd-q317]]> of methodologies, a powerful platform, and open-source data and analytics software, Pivotal works with you to implement new approaches and modern tools to build great software. Make IT a business enabler rather than a cost center!
Until we meet again, here are some resources to start you on your journey:
- On-Demand Webinar: Microservices Approaches for Continuous Data Integration <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry-webinars/microservices-approaches-for-continuous-data-integration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-gartner-cat-cloud-sd-q317]]>, Jurgen Leschner, Pivotal and Matt Aslett, Research Director, 451 Research - Whitepaper: The Upside-Down Economics of Building Your Own Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-upside-down-economics-of-building-your-own-platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-gartner-cat-cloud-sd-q317]]> - Analyst Report from 451 Research: Spring Cloud Data Flow for Continuous Data Processing <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/spring-cloud-data-flow-for-continuous-data-processing?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-gartner-cat-cloud-sd-q317]]> - Gartner Analyst Report: Market Guide for Application Platforms <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/gartner-market-guide-for-application-platforms?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-gartner-cat-cloud-sd-q317]]>
Take advantage of additional online resources for cloud-native patterns <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-gartner-cat-cloud-sd-q317]]>, microservices architectures <[[https://pivotal.io/microservices?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-gartner-cat-cloud-sd-q317]]>, and Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-gartner-cat-cloud-sd-q317]]>.
Now is the time to take the reins of your digital transformation. Let's build something meaningful!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
For more in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-gartner-cat-cloud-sd-q317]]>. The event takes place December 4 - 7, 2017 in San Francisco. Use the code below for $100 off registration!
